neonSql.badSignature:
SELECT "createdAt", status, type, payload->>'error' AS error
FROM "WaMessageLog"
WHERE "createdAt" > now() - interval '24 hours'
  AND status = 'ERROR'
  AND payload->>'error' = 'bad signature'
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 10;
neonSql.noop:
SELECT "createdAt", status, type, payload::text
FROM "WaMessageLog"
WHERE "createdAt" > now() - interval '24 hours'
  AND (status = 'NOOP' OR type = 'NO_AI_DISPATCH_CONTEXT')
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 20;
neonSql.interactiveDisabled:
SELECT "createdAt", status, type, payload::text
FROM "WaMessageLog"
WHERE "createdAt" > now() - interval '24 hours'
  AND type = 'INTERACTIVE_DISABLED'
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 20;
neonSql.dryRun:
SELECT "createdAt", status, type, payload::text
FROM "WaMessageLog"
WHERE "createdAt" > now() - interval '24 hours'
  AND payload::text ILIKE '%"via":"dry-run"%'
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 20;
neonSql.templateReopen:
SELECT "createdAt", "templateName", status, type
FROM "WaMessageLog"
WHERE "createdAt" > now() - interval '24 hours'
  AND "templateName" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 20;
neonSql.inboundDedup:
SELECT "createdAt", status, type, payload->>'preview' AS preview
FROM "WaMessageLog"
WHERE "createdAt" > now() - interval '24 hours'
  AND status = 'INBOUND_DEDUP'
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 20;
neonSql.loginPrompt:
SELECT "createdAt", status, type, payload::text
FROM "WaMessageLog"
WHERE "createdAt" > now() - interval '24 hours'
  AND status = 'LOGIN_PROMPT'
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 20;
neonSql.reminder: SELECT * FROM "ReminderSend" WHERE "phoneE164" IN ('+254705663175', '254705663175') ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC LIMIT 10;
